dmca.title: [ThePlanet-C2636292H] Re: DMCA NOTICE TO INFRINGER theskinnywebsite

-----Original Message-----

To: Copyright
Subject: [ThePlanet-C2636292H] Re: DMCA NOTICE TO INFRINGER
theskinnywebsite

Message-ID: <45AF9DE4.1040204@theskinnywebsite.com>

From: "S. Girl" <girl@theskinnywebsite.com>
User-Agent: Thunderbird 1.5.0.9 (Windows/20061207)

CC:  abuse@theskinnywebsite.com,  abuse@theplanet.com,

Subject: Re: DMCA NOTICE TO  INFRINGER       theskinnywebsite 
X-Priority: 2 (High)
References: <9CA5FA9C-06EE-43C1-84DA-005B1FDB86A1@flynetpictures.com>
In-Reply-To: <9CA5FA9C-06EE-43C1-84DA-005B1FDB86A1@flynetpictures.com>
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1; format=flowed
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-ClamAntiVirus-Scanner: This mail is clean

with any abuse report
X-AntiAbuse: Primary Hostname - host.iquitmydayjob.net

X-AntiAbuse: Originator/Caller UID/GID - [47 12] / [47 12]
X-AntiAbuse: Sender Address Domain - theskinnywebsite.com
X-Source:  
X-Source-Args:  
X-Source-Dir:  
X-OriginalArrivalTime: 18 Jan 2007 16:19:17.0079 (UTC)
FILETIME=[66A87E70:01C73B1C] 

MIME element (text/plain)
All Flynet photos (from all of the emails you sent) have now been
removed from theskinnywebsite.com's web server.  In the future, please
direct inquiries straight to me at girl@theskinnywebsite.com.  I'm more
than happy to comply and remove anything from my website that belongs to
your company.  Thank you. 
 
-Rian 
 
Flynet Pictures wrote: 
> DMCA NOTICE TO AUTHORIZED AGENT (LISTED IN A DIRECTORY MAINTAINED BY 
> U.S. COPYRIGHT OFFICE) AND INFRINGER
> 
> Please be advised that Flynet Pictures, the owner of the exclusive 
> rights in and to the Photograph(s) entitled,  "keira knightley is 
> scary skinny " This copyrighted material is currently being infringed 
> at the following URLs and/or the infringing activity is being found at

> the following URLs:
> 
> http://theskinnywebsite.com/site/2007/01/08/keira-knightley-is-scary-s
> kinny/
> 
>     
> http://theskinnywebsite.com/site/wp-content/uploads/2007/01/57348_hqcb
> net_keira_knightley_32_122_319lo.jpg
> 
>    
> http://theskinnywebsite.com/site/wp-content/uploads/2007/01/kiera.jpg
>     
> http://theskinnywebsite.com/site/wp-content/uploads/2007/01/57393_hqcb
> net_keira_knightley_37_122_470lo.jpg
> 
> 
> and its related pages. On behalf of Flynet Pictures, I request that 
> the foregoing material and/or activity be removed or access to it 
> disabled.
> 
> 
> You may contact me as follows: 
> NAME:            Jason Kirk 
> ADDRESS:     1320 N Sycamore Ave 
>                       Hollywood, CA 90028 
> TEL:               323 461 7564 
> FAX :              323-461-7564 
> E-MAIL:           Jason@flynetpictures.com 
> 
> On behalf of Flynet Pictures, as the owner of the exclusive right of  
> the copyrighted material at issue in this notice, I hereby state that

> I have a good faith belief that the use of the material complained of

> is not authorized by the copyright owner, his agent, or the law. I  
> hereby state, under penalty of perjury under the laws of the State of

> CA and the United States, that the information herein is accurate 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> ======================================================= 
> This email and its contents are confidential. If you 
> are not the intended recipient, please do not disclose 
> or use the information within this email or its 
> attachments. If you have received this email in error, 
> please delete it immediately. Thank you, Flynet Pictures. 
> =======================================================
